name: Interactive Figmaland
description:
With friends & coworkers visit a petting zoo, play hide and seek, race go karts, and more! Interactive Figmaland is a multiplayer interactive world built with FigJam widgets. Objects will animate when a character gets close to them. Select a character and explore interactive art created by:


Austin Akrimont

Ana Boyer

Jenny Chen

Jessie Mao

Katie Jiang

Kenrick Rilee

Laura Pang


You can make your own worlds by also using the Figmaland widget.


Made during Figma's June 2022 Maker Week
